name: language-binge
description: Binge your favorite TV shows and learn a new language!

scripts.build:prod: SET NODE_ENV=production&& rm -rf dist/ && webpack --config webpack.common.cjs && cp dist/dist.zip . && rm dist/dist.zip
scripts.build: SET NODE_ENV=test&& rm -rf dist/ && webpack --config webpack.common.cjs && cp dist/dist.zip . && rm dist/dist.zip
